scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp -R granules ./dist/granules && ../../../node_modules/.bin/webpack
scripts.package: npm run build && sleep 10 && (cd dist && node ../../../../bin/zip.js lambda.zip index.js granules)
scripts.oldpackage: rm -f lambda.zip && node ../../../bin/zip.js lambda.zip index.js node_modules ../../spec/helpers
